name: Ultimate Driving Collection 3D Free - Drive Tractors, Cars and Other Vehicles
name_original: Ultimate Driving Collection 3D Free - Drive Tractors, Cars and Other Vehicles
description:
Did you ever dreamed of having a big collection of different vehicles in your pocket? Not only cars, but different utility vehicles as well? Now your day arrived!

In the Ultimate Driving Collection 3D you get Trucks, Tractors, Bikes, Cars and other vehicles. In the varied challenges you can choose your ideal vehicle for the given surface and environment, some are looking far better in farm roads, meanwhile others are more likely for highways.

The idea behind the collection is very simple, to not limit your enthusiasm to only one type of vehicle, or one type of car. We want you to see smiling when riding a sport car, and then changing to a Tractor, not even the famous action movies are doing that! Now you can do, you can experience, that even a tractor is a wonderful vehicle, that is maybe not so easy to handle first, but then becomes a really nice asset.

All the people drive in the world. Driving is easy, but master it, even with a lot of different vehicles isn't. So we encourage you to get Ultimate Driving Collection 3D and to enjoy the experiences with totally different Tractors, Bikes, Motors, Caes and Vehicles. And then you can call yourself a real motorist!

FEATURES
- Lifelike graphics covering arcade simulation aspects
- Truck, Tractor, Police Car, Racing Car, Bigfoot, Bus, Motor and even more Vehicle inside
- Different settings: Village, Farm, Highway
- Endless gameplay and Fun
- Different skins for your vehicle for added gaming fun

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
